name: Avoiding Death in Deep Space
description:
Avoiding Death in Deep Space is a simple asteroids-type game that I wrote about half a year ago, and recently decided to revisit and refactor.

The game is written in pure JS, using HMTL5 canvas.

Instructions:

  • use ARROW KEYS to move around
  • collect GREEN ORE to gain points
  • avoid GRAY ASTEROIDS to survive

If you're interested in the source code, it's available here :)
